translations.text: Read, ˹O Prophet,˺ in the Name of your Lord Who created—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: created humans from a clinging clot.<sup foot_note=77629>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Read! And your Lord is the Most Generous,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: taught humanity what they knew not.<sup foot_note=77630>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Most certainly, one exceeds all bounds
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: once they think they are self-sufficient.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹But˺ surely to your Lord is the return ˹of all˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Have you seen the man who prevents
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: a servant ˹of Ours˺ from praying?<sup foot_note=77631>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: What if that ˹man˺ persists in denial and turns away?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Does he not know that Allah sees ˹all˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

translations.text: But no! If he does not desist, We will certainly drag him by the forelock—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So let him call his associates.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: We will call the wardens of Hell.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Again, no! Never obey him ˹O Prophet˺! Rather, ˹continue to˺ prostrate and draw near ˹to Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
